commit.message:
Improve some Byte Array Handling Spots

Some small memory-saving improvements in `byte[]` handling.

nodes.bodyText: This should be much more efficient here as we mainly use it on strings that are internally coded as UTF-8 already (mapping update requests) so we just do a simple byte[] copy here instead of creating an oversized array and doing char by char work in the BytesRef code

We get here a lot as part of some snapshot repo operations (when reading index metadata) and it's quite wasteful to first serialize the map to bytes into one buffer only to then compress that buffer to another buffer => just serialize and compress in one go
